Question

![](vufgb-multiplelinearregression-002-en.png)

Answerlist
----------
* The relationship between negative reactivity and parenting confidence is negative and significant.
* Controlled for depressive symptoms, there is no relationship between negative reactivity and parenting confidence.
* The strength of the relationship between negative reactivity and parenting confidence depends on the degree of depressive symptoms.
* The relationship between negative reactivity and parenting confidence appears when depressive symptoms are taken into account.
